snippet.title: Toy bear surprises widow with late husband's laugh
snippet.content:
A woman whose husband died of cancer was brought to tears by a birthday gift. Danira Quijada opened the present as her children watched on at a restaurant. "Squeeze its hand!" someone tells her. Mrs Quijada does so, and is surprised to hear a sound she instantly recognises her late husband's laugh. "After 32 years of marriage, cancer took my dad away," daughter Paola Lopez wrote on Twitter. "So we got [my mom] a bear with his laugh on it for her birthday." "You know what it's like to have everything and you also know what it's like to lose it all.

"No matter how hard your struggle is you remain humble and kind." The video has become and internet sensation, viewed more than 200,000 times. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
